TopicTitle: On Christmas, Santa gave sb sth…

Articles.Content:
This is a Christmas special game. My goal is to make this a hot thread before next Christmas. 

Examples: 

Jeb: On Christmas, Santa gave Bob Dylan a guitar bomb. 

Val :  on Christmas, Santa gave rudolph a black nose. 

Me First: 

On Christmas, santa gave randall munroe a wall made of gold on the equator that is 4km tall. 

Edited December 25, 2022 by Abel Military Services
On Christmas, Santa gave Mortimer Kerman a spreadsheet
On Christmas, Santa gave gene a strut.
